ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Weapon was really something.
No one can compare with his strength.
But with a selection like this,
our weapons could beat him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Oh! Welcome!”{PAUSE}“We don't have much of anything now.
I forgot to order
enough the last time
but feel free to look around!”
